Uses of Package
com.github.tadukoo.view.paint.gradient

Packages that use com.github.tadukoo.view.paint.gradient
Package
Description
com.github.tadukoo.view.paint.gradient
Provides builders for making Gradients that can be used to span an arbitrary space (has a method to generate a Paint when given a Dimension, rather than making a gradient paint that only works for certain dimensions.
  • Classes in com.github.tadukoo.view.paint.gradient used by com.github.tadukoo.view.paint.gradient
    Class
    Description
    Gradient
    Gradient is used to make it easier to create generic Gradient paints, as a SizablePaint.
    GradientBuilder
    Gradient Builder is an abstract builder for a Gradient to be extended by subclasses for making more specific Gradients, e.g.
    LinearGradient
    Linear Gradient is used to build a Gradient object to use for LinearGradientPaint.
    LinearGradient.GradientDirection
    The direction for a LinearGradient to go.
    LinearGradient.LinearGradientBuilder
    Linear Gradient Builder is a builder for LinearGradient.
    RadialGradient
    Linear Gradient is used to build a Gradient object to use for RadialGradientPaint.
    RadialGradient.RadialGradientBuilder
    Radial Gradient Builder is a builder for RadialGradient.
